code: import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BooksList=_ref=>{let{books}=_ref;const handleCategorize=(book,category)=>{const savedCategories=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("categorizedBooks"))||{};const updatedCategories={...savedCategories,[category]:[...(savedCategories[category]||[]),book]};localStorage.setItem("categorizedBooks",JSON.stringify(updatedCategories));alert(`Libro categorizado en ${category}`);};const categories=["Aventuras","Ciencia Ficción","Histórica","Novela Negra","Romántica","Terror","Tecnología"];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:"flex",flexWrap:"wrap",gap:"20px"},children:books.map(book=>{var _book$volumeInfo$auth,_book$volumeInfo$imag;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{border:"1px solid #ccc",padding:"10px",width:"200px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:book.volumeInfo.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:(_book$volumeInfo$auth=book.volumeInfo.authors)===null||_book$volumeInfo$auth===void 0?void 0:_book$volumeInfo$auth.join(", ")}),((_book$volumeInfo$imag=book.volumeInfo.imageLinks)===null||_book$volumeInfo$imag===void 0?void 0:_book$volumeInfo$imag.thumbnail)&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.volumeInfo.imageLinks.thumbnail,alt:book.volumeInfo.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:categories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleCategorize(book,category),style:{margin:"5px",padding:"5px",fontSize:"12px"},children:category},category))})]},book.id);})});};export default BooksList;
